The content of this folder no longer works as local files as the media files
have to be served in a web server in order to make it work with XMLHttpRequest.
The content of this folder will be synced to
https://pantheon.***REMOVED***/project/yt-cobalt/storage/browser/yt-media-test/
so we can always access it via the following url:
http://storage.googleapis.com/yt-media-test/media-element-demo.html.
